::Prowl::

Prowl sighs, recieving Ramhorn's transmission. "Plintissa said that her 
forces will not attack the maximal base," he replies, "After making some 
false claims that they could easily crush us. Are you sure they opened fire 
on her orders?"

He takes out his gun just in case, turning to Plintissa.
